title: Additional unemployment compensation fund
context: §385-12 Additional unemployment compensation fund. There is created a fund to be known as the additional unemployment compensation fund. The director of finance of the State shall be custodian of the fund, and all disbursements therefrom shall be paid by the director upon orders signed by the director. Moneys credited to the account of the fund may be requisitioned and used for the payment of expenses incurred for the administration of this chapter. [L 1961, c 157, pt of §1; am L 1963, c 114, §1; Supp, §93B-13; HRS §385-12; gen ch 1985]
